Subject: Opt out
Description:
Hi
We are carrying out our renewal and our legal team would like us to opt out based on the following:
 If Licensee does not agree to such collection and use of Usage Data, Licensee can opt-out of the Netwrix Customer Experience Program during installation of the Software or by changing Licenseeâ€™s preferences in the Software settings after installation of the Software:

I cannot find this option in end point protector.
Can you confirm how to proceed.
Thanks
Solution_Comment__c: In order to opt out, please turn off "Live Update Reporting" -- here is a link to the help article: https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EndpointProtector_5.9.4/page/Content/EndpointProtector/Admin/Dashboard/SystemDashboard.htm
